price: 30. Wana ezali ete Allah azali bosembo, mpe ya sólo, maye manso bazali kobondela na botiki ye mazali mpamba, mpe ya solo, Allah azali likolo mpe monene koleka.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-anna mā yadʿūna min dūnihi al-bāṭilu wa-anna al-laha huwa al-ʿaliyu al-kabīru
